archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1072
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner/marketer I want to be able to track promotional/refferral codes for ativation and be able to set expiry dates, so that I can understand and manage how customers interact with promotions

properties.value: [CCM] OOTB A/B Testing and OOTB campaign effectivness measurment. Expiration is to be configured in BSS

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
